message.entry: Failed to create a ROS publisher with topic name {0} and message type {1}.
Error publishing a message with message type {0}.
Response from ROS network indicated failure to publish.
Topic {0} is not available on the ROS network. Use "rostopic list" to display available topics.
Topic {0} with message type {1} is already on the ROS network. Try creating the publisher with type {1}, not {2}.
Error occurred while requesting information on the ROS publisher.
ROS node is no longer accessible by the publisher. Recreate the publisher on a valid node.
Invalid network reference stored by the ROS publisher. Recreate the publisher.
Multiple ROS publishers with the same reference on node. Recreate the node.
